nodes.text: Tsaiwinokka Hoyakut, translated as Reanimated Dead from the Sith language, was a spell that could be used to create undead. This complex spell could awaken the freshly-dead and skeletons, transforming them into an unstoppable legion impervious to pain and capable of transmitting a necromantic infection through biting. Dathka Graush was the one who successfully melded spellcasting and alchemy, to perfect necromancy. Sorzus Syn expressed regret at not being able to meet him, and recorded the spell in her journals.
Asajj Ventress appeared to learned this ability, bringing up the corpses of Gungans to assist her against the Jedi in the Battle of Ohma-D'un.
